short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A simple reminder and alarm extension for employees.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Stay on top of your tasks with the Short-term Reminder Extension for Google Chrome. This handy tool helps you set quick reminders for tasks or events within minutes, making it perfect for those last-minute to-dos or important tasks that you don't want to forget.

With Short-term Reminder Extension, you can easily set reminders in minutes, ensuring that you never miss a deadline or appointment again. The extension keeps track of your reminders, allowing you to view a list of upcoming tasks and events at a glance.

Key Features:

- Set short-term reminders in minutes

- View a list of upcoming reminders sorted by time remaining

- Delete reminders with a simple click

- Get notified when a reminder is due with a pop-up window

Whether it's a quick email you need to send, a meeting you can't miss, or a simple task that you need to complete, Short-term Reminder Extension has got you covered. Keep your daily tasks organised and never miss a beat with this must-have extension for Google Chrome.

Install Short-term Reminder Extension today and take control of your time!
